cmd_voice_waiting_description: Create a waiting room for join request to your temporary channel
cmd_voice_bitrate_description: Change the bitrate of your temporary channel
cmd_voice_block_description: Block users from accessing your temporary channe
cmd_voice_claim_description: Claim a temporary channel and gain ownership of it
cmd_voice_info_description: Get information about a temporary channel
cmd_voice_invite_description: Invite a user to your temporary channel
cmd_voice_kick_description: Kick a user from your temporary channel
cmd_voice_limit_description: Change the user limit of your temporary channel
cmd_voice_name_description: Change the name of your temporary channel
cmd_voice_privacy_description: Lock or hide your temporary channel
cmd_voice_region_description: Change the region of your temporary channel
cmd_voice_thread_description: Create a temporary thread for your temporary channel
cmd_voice_transfer_description: Transfer the ownership of your temporary channel to another user
cmd_voice_trust_description: Trust users with permanent access to your temporary channel
cmd_voice_unblock_description: Unblock users from your temporary channel
cmd_voice_untrust_description: Remove trusted users access to your temporary channel
cmd_voice_users_description: Shows you a list of all trusted and blocked users of your temporary channel
cmd_voice_password_description: Set a password for your temporary channel
cmd_voice_reset_description: Reset the configuration of your temporary channel
cmd_voice_lfp_description: Send an invite link to your temporary channel in this chat
cmd_voice_status_description: Change the status of your temporary channel
cmd_join_description: Join a temporary channel by using a password
cmd_setup_tempvoice_description: Setup TempVoice easily with an assistant within seconds
cmd_help_description: Get help with the TempVoice Discord Bot
cmd_find_description: Find out which voice channel a user is in
info_setup:
## **Setup Complete!**
 {val1} can now be used to create temporary voice channels in your Discord server.
info_setup_interface:
## **Setup Complete!**
 This [interface]({val1}) can now be used to manage temporary voice channels in your Discord server.
info_reset:
## **Reset!**
 All your settings have been reset to default.
error_validated:
## **Premium Expired!**
 {val1} Please contact an Admin. This creator channel isnt valid anymore because the premium subscription got canceled.
error_ownerless:
## **Attention!**
 The administrators of this Discord server have decided that temporary voice channels from {val1} cannot be managed.
error_empty:
## **Attention!**
 There are no users that you can select from.
error_setup:
## **No Creators Found!**
 This Bot has not been set up yet. If you are an admin, use </setup:921000495877877762>.
error_manage:
## **Not Permitted!**
 You need the **Manage Server** permission to use this command.
error_vote:
## **Locked Command!**
 This command can be temporary unlocked by [voting](<https://top.gg/bot/762217899355013120/vote>), or permanently unlocked with [premium](<https://tempvoice.xyz/premium>).
error_target:
## **Attention!**
 You cannot use this command for the selected user(s).
error_ownership:
## **Attention!**
 Only the temporary voice channel owner can use this command. If the current owner has left, claim the voice channel by using: </voice claim:921416747687489568>.
error_permissions:
## **Missing Permissions!**
 Following permissions are **required** for my **server settings role** and **category of temporary channels**: {val1}
### Why do I need these permissions?
To properly create and manage channels.
error_permissions_sync:
## **Missing Permissions!**
 Following permissions are **required** for my **server settings role** and **category of temporary channels**: {val1}
### Why do I need these permissions?
To **Sync Permissions** I need all the permissions that need to be synced.
error_deactivated:
## **Attention!**
 The administrators of this Discord server have decided to deactivate this command for all temporary voice channels of {val1}.
error_limit:
## **Premium Required!**
 The limit of free creator channels is {val1}. Try deleting one or setup unlimited with [TempVoice Premium](<https://tempvoice.xyz/premium>).
error_ratelimit:
## **Slow Down!**
 This command can be used again **{val1}**.
https://easy.tempvoice.xyz/faq/5min-cooldown
error_creation:
## **Slow Down!**
 You can create a new channel **{val1}**.
error_total_limit:
## **Attention!**
 The administrators of this Discord server have decided to limit the number of total temporary voice channels to **{val1}**. Please try again later.
error_category_limit:
## **Attention!**
 All available categories have reached their limit of 50 channels each. If you are an admin, you can set up more [Fallback Categories](https://easy.tempvoice.xyz/config/creator/overview/category#fallback-categories) in the dashboard, otherwise please try again later.
error_server_limit:
## **Attention!**
 The Discord server has reached the limit of 500 channels that can exist at the same time. Please try again later.
error_current_category_limit:
## **Attention!**
 The category of your temporary voice channel have reached their limit of 50 channels. Please try again later.
error_cb:
## **Activate Premium and Kick <@762217899355013120>**
This [TempVoice Custom Branding](https://tempvoice.xyz/premium) bot has been successfully installed and invited to this Discord server.
## Activate Premium
 The owner of the custom branding bot has to activate TempVoice Premium on this Discord server.
https://tempvoice.xyz/premium > `Login with Discord` > `Manage Subscription` > `Activate Premium`
## Kick the public <@762217899355013120> bot
Only the Custom Branding bot needs to be on this Discord server.
## Important
Existing Creator Channels from the public TempVoice bot will work like before. Only interfaces have to be recreated using **/setup**.

This bot will leave this Discord if Premium is not going to be activated soon.
error_conflict:
## **Unexpected Conflict.**
 TempVoice had a conflict with Discord's API. Report this message here https://discord.gg/tempvoice. 
### Error: `{val1}`

help:
## Setup & Configure TempVoice
Visit the bot's [dashboard](https://tempvoice.xyz/dashboard) to configure TempVoice and use </setup:921000495877877762> to create all the necessary channels such a
**`➕` Creator Channel** & **`✨` Interface Message**.
## Create Your First Temporary Channel
Join a **`➕` Creator Channel** (voice channel) to create a new temporary voice channel. 
## Manage Your Temporary Channel
Use **/voice** chat commands or a **`✨` Interface Message**.

</voice name:921416747687489568>, </voice limit:921416747687489568>, </voice privacy:921416747687489568>, </voice kick:921416747687489568> etc ...
setup:
## `➕` Creator Channel
Join this channel to create a new temporary voice channel.
## `✨` Interface Message
Alternative to **/voice** chat commands. Use this channel to manage your temporary voice channel.
interface_description: This **interface** can be used to manage temporary voice channels. More options are available with **/voice** commands.
interface_footer: Press the buttons below to use the interface
privacy_menu_description_1: Only trusted users will be able to join your voice channel
privacy_menu_description_2: Everyone will be able to join your voice channel
privacy_menu_description_3: Only trusted users will be able to view your voice channel
privacy_menu_description_4: Everyone will be able to view your voice channel
privacy_menu_description_5: Only trusted users will be able to text in your chat
privacy_menu_description_6: Everyone will be able to text in your chat
waiting_menu_description_1: User will be moved into your voice channel
waiting_menu_description_2: User will be kicked and blocked
did_you_know_1: TempVoice exists since 2021 to set new quality standards for temporary channels
did_you_know_2: Tempvoice has been continuously developed for years with feedback from the community
did_you_know_3: TempVoice translation is open source on GitHub. You can improve an existing translation or add another one
did_you_know_4: TempVoice documentation is open source on GitHub. You can improve an existing guide or add another one
did_you_know_5: TempVoice is trusted by hundreds of thousands communities, streamers and official game servers
did_you_know_6: TempVoice does not collect any usage data and respects your privacy
did_you_know_7: TempVoice protects your privacy the best with '/voice privacy' & '/voice block'
did_you_know_8: TempVoice lets you accept join request with a waiting room from '/voice waiting'
did_you_know_9: TempVoice lets you set a passwort with '/voice passwort' which can be used by users with '/find'
did_you_know_10: TempVoice stores your temporary channel settings until you create another one
